newsitem.title: USA: Top U.S. general to visit South Korea, Japan.
newsitem.headline: Top U.S. general to visit South Korea, Japan.

text.p: Army Gen. John Shalikashvili, chairman of the U.S. military Joint Chiefs of Staff, will visit South Korea and Japan next week, the Defence Department said on Monday.
Shalikashvili will depart on Sunday and visit Korea on April 8-9 and Japan on April 10-11 for meetings with government leaders and U.S. military commanders. He will return to Washington on April 12.
Defence Secretary William Cohen will also make his first trip to the two countries next week but he will go first to Japan, then to South Korea.
